content.rendered:
Kindergarten | First Grade | Second Grade | Third Grade | Fourth Grade | Fifth Grade

Kindergarten

Personal Supplies 

Please label all items.

  • Backpack, needs to fit in small, narrow lockers
  • Plastic, standard rectangular pencil box( labeled with name)
  • 2 boxes of 24 crayons (Crayola are best)
  • Art smock (a parent/guardians old t-shirt works well)
  • Headphones with cord – no ear buds (out of package and in a labeled plastic bag) 

To Share with the Class

  • 2 packages of baby wipes
  • 1 box of #2 pencils
  • 1 fine tip black sharpie
  • Girls- 1 box of sandwich bags
  • Girls – 2 boxes of tissues
  • Boys – 2 rolls of paper towels
  • Boys- 1 box of gallon sized bags

First Grade

  • A healthy snack (every day)
  • 2 boxes of sharpened Ticonderoga #2 pencils
  • 1 pair of Fiskar children’s scissors
  • 2 pink wedge erasers (any brand/color)
  • 1 red two-pocket folder (with pockets at the bottom, no clasps, please)
  • 2 boxes of 24 Crayola crayons
  • 1 box of 8 regular sized Classic Colors Crayola markers (conical/broad tip)
  • 1 box of 4 Expo Markers
  • 1 plastic pencil box (6×8 spacemaker is a good size)
  • 2 large Elmer’s gluesticks
  • Headphones in a plastic Ziploc bag (labeled with the student’s name)
  • Art smock (an old shirt is fine)
  • Sneakers (for gym class and recess)
  • Backpack
  • 1 box of tissues
  • 1 box of Ziploc bags (gallon size)
  • 1 container of disinfectant wipes
  • 1 container of baby wipes

Second Grade

  • 2 Boxes Crayola Crayons (24 Count)
  • 1 Box Washable Markers (10 or 12 Count) 
  • 2 dozen #2 Ticonderoga pencils (sharpened)
  • 1 pack  Low Odor Expo Dry Erase Markers (black)
  • 1 pair  Children’s scissors
  • 4- 6 Elmer’s Glue Sticks
  • Headphones (in a Ziploc bag labeled with name)
  • 2 Pocket Folders (one red and one green)
  • Additional 2 Pocket Folder for Music only
  • 1 Hard Pencil Box
  • 2 Boxes of Tissues
  • 1 Canister of Disinfectant Wipes

Third Grade

  • 8-count Crayola Washable Markers
  • 12-count colored pencils
  • 8-count crayons
  • 8-count dry-erase markers
  • 1 black Sharpie marker
  • 1 black extra-fine Sharpie marker
  • 1 sharp-pointed Fiskars-type scissors
  • 8 glue sticks
  • 3 dozen pre-sharpened Dixon-Ticonderoga #2 Pencils
  • Headphones for computer use (NO earbuds) inside a gallon-sized plastic bag with students name on it.  Please make sure they still work
  • 1 composition notebook
  • 1 pocket folder
  • Additional Pocket Folder for Music only
  • Hand-held noiseless pencil sharpener
  • 1 pencil case (to hold pencils, crayons, scissors, and erasers)
  • 12” ruler
  • Kleenex – 2 large rectangular-sized box
  • Wipes – 1 package
  • 2 rolls of Paper Towels
  • A book to read on a daily basis
  • Your smile and positive attitude

*Please note: more supplies may be needed for replenishment throughout the year.

Fourth Grade

  • 3-boxes of #2 pre-sharpened pencils (Ticonderoga preferred)
  • 1 set of headphones (in a zip-loc bag, labeled with name)
  • 4- Dry Erase markers
  • 1pencil case
  • 1 box of colored pencils
  • 2 fine point sharpies & 2 ultra fine point sharpies
  • 2 packs of glue sticks (at least 6)
  • 1– 3-subject notebook (any color)
  • 1 composition notebook (any color)
  • 5 two–pocket folders (1-green, 1-blue, 1-yellow, 1-red, 1-purple) – Plastic folder preferred
  • Additional 2 Pocket Folder for Music only
  • 1 pair of small scissors
  • 2  boxes of tissues
  • 1 roll of paper towels
  • 1 container of disinfectant wipes

Fifth Grade

  • Please label all supplies with your first name, last name and homeroom
  • Pencil pouch- a medium size zipper pouch 
  • Pencils- 2 boxes of #2 Dixon Ticonderoga. Please keep a good supply at home and replenish as needed throughout the year. 
  • Colored Pencils- 1 box 
  • Scissors- 1 good pair 
  • Glue Sticks- 2 large (Elmer’s preferred)
  • Wide Ruled Sprial Notebook- 1 to be used for various writing tasks
  • 1- Graphing Notebook – 1 for Math, we find the graph paper helps students align numbers properly for multi-digit multiplication, long division and to help stack fractions
  • 2 Pocket Folder for Music only
  • Tissues – 2 boxes to be shared with the class throughout the year
  • Baby Wipes- 1-2 packages of baby wipes (not Clorox or Lysol)
  • Headphones with a plug (not wireless)
  • Please do not bring in binders and /or trapper keepers.   They are much to large and do not fit well into the desks or lockers
